author: Staff Reporter
text:
As many as 379 students from the Vel Tech College received their degree certificates at the third Graduation Day held on Saturday.

Calling the graduates ‘the hope of a new India,’ chief guest K. Venugopal, Whole Time Director of Kasturi & Sons Limited, urged them to apply their minds to finding solutions for the challenges the country was grappling with. “There has been a lot of change in the world and not all of them have been for the better. Issues regarding environment deterioration have been rising,” he said. Placing his confidence in the competence of the graduates, he said the power of learning would be of advantage to them.
title: Graduation Day
